bill_title: provide for certain persons to carry a concealed pistol or revolver without a permit.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for certain persons to carry a concealed pistol or revolver without a permit. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 22-14-9 be amended to read: 22-14-9. Any A person, other than is guilty of a Class 1 misdemeanor if the person is not a law enforcement officer as defined in § 22-1-2 acting under color of authority, who or a person who is a resident of this state who meets the requirements of subdivisions 23-7-7.1(1) to (5), inclusive, and subdivisions 23-7-7.1(7) to (10), inclusive, and: (1) Carries a pistol or revolver, loaded or unloaded, concealed on or about his or her person the person's body without a permit as provided in chapter 23-7; or (2) Carries a pistol or revolver, loaded or unloaded, concealed in any vehicle while operating the vehicle, without a permit as provided in chapter 23-7; is guilty of a Class 1 misdemeanor. Section 2. That chapter 23-7 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: A person who is a resident of a state that allows a resident of that state to carry a concealed pistol or revolver without a permit, and that allows a resident of this state to carry a concealed pistol or revolver without a permit issued by that state, may carry a concealed pistol or revolver in this state without a permit issued under this chapter.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
